WorkItem.Description:
Add a tool which returns values of km/mi for every social distance tool (which return values as % acceptance).

This probably should be done after we've allowed enabling and disabling of score tools, so that the user is not overwhelmed by duplicitous tools.
WorkItem.Summary: A regular distance score tool for every social distance score tool

Comments.Message: Due to time constraints, we do not expect this feature will be included in the final release.
